name: MAAGI
description:
CONTROLS: W A S D  =  movement
MOUSE  =  interacting with ui
E  =  to interact with things in the world
SHIFT  =  run
SOME EXPLANATIONS / GUIDE:
 The game isn't very well explained, you are just plopped into the world with no prep.

So; here are a few quick things.

SPELLS can be bought, upgraded and managed from the veleeho, which is the wizard in the pizzeria
INTERACT with an ore, or a tree to deposit your tools to destroy it (with your dark magic)
Which is where the idle part comes in, go do something else like FIGHTING or just do something else with your life, and come back to get resources by doing absolutely nothing.

If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask, i don't have much to do with my life either so why not answer them. The note about you having to figure it out yourself, is just a joke.
